actionConfiguration.body: select id as "Doc ID", created_at as "Creation Date", updated_at as "Updation Date", doc_type as "Document Type", doc_number as "Document Number", right(doc_link,length(doc_link)-69) as "Document Link", sbm_status as "SBM Status", happay_status as "Happay Status", json_extract_path_text(status_metadata::json,'happay','remarks') as "Happay Comment", json_extract_path_text(status_metadata::json,'maker','remarks') as "Maker Comment", json_extract_path_text(status_metadata::json,'checker','remarks') as "Checker Comment", kyc_status as "KYC Status" from kyc_docs where bo_id = '{{appsmith.store.chkr_app_id}}' and kyc_docs.kyc_owner = 'sbm_bank'
